languages.text: "Разыскать путь к планете Салис Прайм. Там находится упавший корабль святой Ардженты, моей покровительницы. И там должна покоиться принадлежавшая ей великая реликвия — Единственная звезда".
"To find the way to the planet called Salis Prime. Saint Argenta is my patroness, and that is where her fallen ship is. And it must also be the resting place of her great relic — the One Star."
languages.original_text: "Разыскать путь к планете Салис Прайм. Там находится упавший корабль святой Ардженты, моей покровительницы. И там должна покоиться принадлежавшая ей великая реликвия — Единственная звезда".

traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “找到通往萨利斯主星的航路。圣阿洁塔是我的守护神，她的飞船坠落在了那颗行星上。她的伟大圣物‘命运之星’也一定在那里。”
languages.original_text: "To find the way to the planet called Salis Prime. Saint Argenta is my patroness, and that is where her fallen ship is. And it must also be the resting place of her great relic — the One Star."

traits.locale_text: “找到通往萨利斯主星的航路。圣阿洁塔是我的守护神，她的飞船坠落在了那颗行星上。她的伟大圣物‘命运之星’也一定在那里。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "To find the way to the planet called Salis Prime. Saint Argenta is my patroness, and that is where her fallen ship is. And it must also be the resting place of her great relic — the One Star."

languages.text: «Encontrar el planeta conocido como Salis Prime. Santa Argenta, mi patrona, cayó allí con su nave. También es el lugar de descanso de su mayor reliquia: la Estrella Única».
languages.original_text: "To find the way to the planet called Salis Prime. Saint Argenta is my patroness, and that is where her fallen ship is. And it must also be the resting place of her great relic — the One Star."

traits.locale_text: «Encontrar el planeta conocido como Salis Prime. Santa Argenta, mi patrona, cayó allí con su nave. También es el lugar de descanso de su mayor reliquia: la Estrella Única».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「サリス・プライムと呼ばれる惑星への道を見つけることだ。私の守護聖人である聖アルジェンタ。その船が堕ちた場所なのだ。そしてそこは、彼女の偉大な遺物である『一つ星』が眠る場所でもあるはずだ」
languages.original_text: "To find the way to the planet called Salis Prime. Saint Argenta is my patroness, and that is where her fallen ship is. And it must also be the resting place of her great relic — the One Star."

traits.locale_text: 「サリス・プライムと呼ばれる惑星への道を見つけることだ。私の守護聖人である聖アルジェンタ。その船が堕ちた場所なのだ。そしてそこは、彼女の偉大な遺物である『一つ星』が眠る場所でもあるはずだ」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Den Weg zu dem Planeten namens Salis Prime zu finden. Die Heilige Argenta ist meine Schutzpatronin, und dort befindet sich ihr gefallenes Schiff. Und dort muss sich auch die letzte Ruhestätte ihres größten Relikts liegen — des Einen Sterns."
languages.original_text: "To find the way to the planet called Salis Prime. Saint Argenta is my patroness, and that is where her fallen ship is. And it must also be the resting place of her great relic — the One Star."

traits.locale_text: "Den Weg zu dem Planeten namens Salis Prime zu finden. Die Heilige Argenta ist meine Schutzpatronin, und dort befindet sich ihr gefallenes Schiff. Und dort muss sich auch die letzte Ruhestätte ihres größten Relikts liegen — des Einen Sterns."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Trouver un moyen de rejoindre la planète appelée Salis Prime. Sainte Argenta est ma patronne, et c'est là-bas que se trouve son vaisseau échoué. En ce même lieu repose à coup sûr son éminente relique, l'Étoile unique. »
languages.original_text: "To find the way to the planet called Salis Prime. Saint Argenta is my patroness, and that is where her fallen ship is. And it must also be the resting place of her great relic — the One Star."

traits.locale_text: « Trouver un moyen de rejoindre la planète appelée Salis Prime. Sainte Argenta est ma patronne, et c'est là-bas que se trouve son vaisseau échoué. En ce même lieu repose à coup sûr son éminente relique, l'Étoile unique. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Salis Prime adlı gezegene giden bir yol bulmak. Azize Argenta benim hamimdir, düşen gemisi de o gezegende. Yüce yadigârı Emsalsiz Yıldız da orada olmalı."
languages.original_text: "To find the way to the planet called Salis Prime. Saint Argenta is my patroness, and that is where her fallen ship is. And it must also be the resting place of her great relic — the One Star."

traits.locale_text: "Salis Prime adlı gezegene giden bir yol bulmak. Azize Argenta benim hamimdir, düşen gemisi de o gezegende. Yüce yadigârı Emsalsiz Yıldız da orada olmalı."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
